page.title: 16THE HEALTH VISITOR
page.content: { }THE{HEALTH VISITOR},WHO COVERS THE{ {OATHLAW}AREA ,IS A FEMALE AND IS QUALIFIED AS A{MIDWIFE}. SHE HAS TO USE HER OWN CAR AND PAY FOR HER OWN PETROL, BUT IS EMPLOYED BY {TAYSIDE HEALTH BOARD}. A HEALTH VISITOR'S JOB IS MAINLY PREVENTATIVE, MAKING SURE THAT BABIES AND YOUNG CHILDREN ARE FIT HEALTHY,AND PROGRESSING AS THEY SHOULD BE FOR THEIR AGE. AT{RAVENSWOOD CLINIC}AND ALSO A {PRACTICE}IN{FORFAR}SHE TAKES CLASSES FOR PEOPLE WHO WILL SOON BECOME PARENTS.WHEN THEY DO BECOME PARENTS SHE MAY, IF THEY ARE IN HER AREA, HAVE THE JOB OF CHECKING ON THEM. SHE TAKES THE WEEKEND OFF, BUT USES THAT TIME FOR{MARATHON RUNNING,}WHICH IS A HOBBY OF HERS, AND CATCHING UP WITH HOUSEHOLD CHORES.
